桃仁.definition: peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine

桃園.definition: Taoyuan city and county in Taiwan

桃園三結義.definition: Oath of the Peach Garden, sworn by Liu Bei 劉備|刘备[Liu2 Bei4], Zhang Fei 張飛|张飞[Zhang1 Fei1] and Guan Yu 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3] at the start of the Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4]

桃園市.definition: Taoyuan city in north Taiwan, capital of Taoyuan county

桃園結義.definition: to make a pact of brotherhood (from “Romance of the Three Kingdoms” 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4]) (idiom)

桃城.definition: Taocheng district of Hengshui city 衡水市[Heng2 shui3 shi4], Hebei

桃城區.definition: Taocheng district of Hengshui city 衡水市[Heng2 shui3 shi4], Hebei

桃太郎.definition: Momotaro or Peach Boy, the hero of a Japanese folk tale; (Tw) Japanese person

桃山.definition: Taoshan, a district of Qitaihe 七臺河市|七台河市[Qi1tai2he2 Shi4], Heilongjiang

桃山區.definition: Taoshan, a district of Qitaihe 七臺河市|七台河市[Qi1tai2he2 Shi4], Heilongjiang

桃江.definition: Taojiang county in Yiyang 益陽|益阳[Yi4 yang2], Hunan

桃江縣.definition: Taojiang county in Yiyang 益陽|益阳[Yi4 yang2], Hunan

桃源縣.definition: Taoyuan county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan

桃色.definition: pink; peach color; illicit love; sexual

桃花扇.definition: The Peach Blossom Fan, historical play about the last days of the Ming dynasty by Kong Shangren 孔尚任[Kong3 Shang4 ren4]

桃花源.definition: the Peach Blossom Spring, a hidden land of peace and prosperity; utopia

桃花運.definition: luck with the ladies; a romance; good luck

桃莉羊.definition: (Tw) Dolly (1996-2003), female sheep, first mammal to be cloned from an adult somatic cell

桃金娘科.definition: Myrtaceae (family including myrtle, rosemary, oregano etc)
